name: Afghanistan
nature: mostly low plateau with deserts, rangelands and a fertile plain in the southeast
resources: natural gas, petroleum, coal, copper, chromite, talc, barites, sulfur, lead, zinc, iron ore, salt, precious and semiprecious stone
food: Kabuli pulao, Gosh-e fil, Mastawa, Borani banjan, Chopan kabob
animals: snow leopard, Marco Polo sheep, Siberian musk deer, markhor, urial

name: Albania
agriculture: tobacco, figs, olives, wheat, maize, potatoes, vegetables, fruits, sugar beets, grapes, meat, honey, dairy products, and medicinal and aromatic plants.
nature: mountainous geography,editerranean climate, with mild and humid winters followed by hot and dry summers,Illyrian deciduous forests, Dinaric mixed forests, Balkan mixed forests and Pindus mixed forests
animals: foxes, golden eagles, peregrine falcons, plovers, egrets, fire salamanders, beech martens, sea turtles, and dolphins
